title: Heat: Racing Board Game Season Tracker
description: A website built to track standings in a custom season of the Heat board game, designed by a friend.

title: Portfolio Website
description: A personal portfolio website showcasing my projects and skills.

title: kailistacey.com Tutoring Website
description: A website built for a tutoring business, featuring information about services, contact details, and a booking system.

title: Resume Friendly: Resume Builder App
description: A web application designed to help users create and format their resumes in an ATS-friendly way, with customisable themes and templates.

title: Project Raygun: Postman Clone
description: A clone of the popular API testing tool Postman, built using React and TypeScript. It allows users to create and send HTTP requests, view responses, and manage collections of requests.

title: Event Broker Service
description: A simple PoC event broker system built using Node.js. Designed to facilitate event driven systems such as game backends, microservices, or any system that benefits from decoupled communication.
